description: Only display ``--page-size`` when an operation can be paginated (`issue 956 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/956>`__)
Generates a JSON skeleton to fill out and be used as input to ``--cli-input-json``. (`issue 963 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/963>`_)

Runs an operation using a global JSON file that supplies all of the operation's arguments. This JSON file can be generated by ``--generate-cli-skeleton``. (`issue 963 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/963>`_)
